mapper.select: SELECT course.id `id`,course.title,course.cover, teacher.name `teacherName`,subject1.title `subjectLevelOne`, subject2.title `subjectLevelTwo`, course.lesson_num `lessonNum`, course.price FROM guli.edu_course `course` LEFT JOIN guli.edu_teacher `teacher` ON course.teacher_id = teacher.id LEFT JOIN guli.edu_subject `subject1` ON course.subject_id = subject1.id LEFT JOIN guli.edu_subject `subject2` ON course.subject_parent_id = subject2.id WHERE course.id = #{courseId}
